  <page>
    <title>BioLib Staden io lib</title>
    <id>16</id>
    <revision>
      <id>158</id>
      <timestamp>2009-02-15T16:53:29Z</timestamp>
      <contributor>
        <username>Pjotrp</username>
        <id>2</id>
      </contributor>
      <text xml:space="preserve">Staden io_lib is the support library for the [http://staden.sourceforge.net/ Staden assembly programs] (like gap4, trace, makescf...). BioLib maps the read and write functions for different trace formats as defined in the Read.h file:

  /* Trace file formats */
  #define TT_ERR -1
  #define TT_UNK 0
  #define TT_SCF 1
  #define TT_ABI 2
  #define TT_ALF 3
  #define TT_PLN 4
  #define TT_EXP 5
  #define TT_CTF 6
  #define TT_ZTR 7
  #define TT_ZTR1 8
  #define TT_ZTR2 9
  #define TT_ZTR3 10
  #define TT_BIO 11
  #define TT_SFF 12
  #define TT_ANY TT_UNK

so any format can be read, or converted to another using the Bio* languages.

* For the current API see [[Main Page#DOCUMENTION]]</text>
    </revision>
